EmailTemplate.name: Ryan Targeted Lead Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi -
This is Ryan Scott from WEX, your fleet fuel card provider. Thank you for your business. You may have seen an email from us recently, and I wanted to see if you were interested in learning about our GPS/Telematics solution. Do you have time to chat this week?
Best Regards,
Ryan Scott Account Executive WEX Inc. 123 Darling Avenue, So. Portland, ME 04106 Office 207-523-6224 www.wexinc.com
